page.title: 11The Local Garages.
page.content: Crawford's position beside the A74 means that it is well provided with garages.There are two garages in Crawford.They are Weston's Garage and South of Scotland Coachworks.Neither garage has petrol,instead they provide a breakdown service for both cars and lorries. Weston's Garage has several large breakdown vehicles.They collect vehicles which breakdown on the A74 and also vehicles which are involved in accidents.They then repair the vehicles in the garage. As neither garage in Crawford has petrol,people in Crawford have to go to Abington(3 miles away)if they wish to buy petrol.
